mapper.select: select DATAPOINT.ID, DATAPOINT.NAME, QUESTION.QUESTIONTEXT, DATAPOINT.MEASUNITID, MEASUREMENTUNIT.DISPLAY_TYPE, ENUMTYPE.DESCRIPTION, ENUMTYPE.VALUE from FORMVERSION, SECTION, QUESTION, DATAPOINT, MEASUREMENTUNIT LEFT JOIN ENUMTYPE ON ENUMTYPE.MEASUNITID = MEASUREMENTUNIT.ID where FORMVERSION.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND FORMVERSION.ID = SECTION.FORMVERSIONID AND SECTION.ID = QUESTION.SECTIONID AND QUESTION.DATAPOINTID = DATAPOINT.ID AND MEASUREMENTUNIT.ID = DATAPOINT.MEASUNITID ORDER BY QUESTION.QUESTIONTEXT
